description: The Government of Canada has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.Item 1, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 21-910-9752, Valve, safety reliefPart No.: YB2385RS423 Quantity: 9, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt.Item 2, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 21-910-9752, Valve, safety reliefPart No.: YB2385RS423 Quantity: 9, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax.Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement for Safety Valve

## Solicitation Details

* **Title:** Valve, Safety Relief
* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01005211
* **Solicitation Number:** w8482-230430/b
* **Publication Date:** August 24, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 3, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST

## Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** GD
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Selection Criteria:**
No specific selection criteria are mentioned in the solicitation.

## Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to suppliers who can claim preference under various trade agreements, including:
* Atlantic Procurement Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Solicited Items

The Department of National Defence seeks to procure the following items:
* Item 1: Valve, Safety Relief (Part No.: YB2385RS423, NCAGE: 35795) - Quantity: 9 units, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* Item 2: Valve, Safety Relief (Part No.: YB2385RS423, NCAGE: 35795) - Quantity: 9 units, to be delivered to CFB Halifax

## Bidding Requirements

* Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Normandin, Jean-Pierre
819-939-3674
jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
Angus Robertson jlonggue@forces.gc.ca
